title: 5/15/17 - "Trump Exhaustion" plaguing the GOP?
description:
Former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper says our institutions are under assault from the executive branch ...Conspiracy theory from former Obama administration official ...Is Keith Olbermann and the radical left calling for revolution? ...The story of an FBI shootout revisited ...How did the 35,000 FBI employees take the firing ...How does the GOP feel about President Trump these days? ...Ann Coulter about to unhitch from the Donald Trump bandwagon.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
